1: וּבָעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>And at that time</n> הַהִיא֩ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> יַעֲמֹ֨ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stand up</n> מִֽיכָאֵ֜ל <sup>4317 </sup> <n>shall Michael</n> הַשַּׂ֣ר <sup>8269 </sup> <n>prince</n> הַגָּד֗וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>the great</n> הָעֹמֵד֮ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>which standeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for the children</n> עַמֶּךָ֒ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> וְהָיְתָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and there shall be</n> עֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>a time</n> צָרָ֔ה <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>such</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>never</n> נִהְיְתָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>occurred</n> מִֽהְי֣וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>occurred</n> גּ֔וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>such as never was since there was a nation</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הָעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>[even] to that same time</n> הַהִ֑יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>that</n> וּבָעֵ֤ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>and at that time</n> הַהִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִמָּלֵ֣ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>shall be delivered</n> עַמְּךָ֔ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thy people</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everyone</n> הַנִּמְצָ֖א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>every one that shall be found</n> כָּת֥וּב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>written</n> בַּסֵּֽפֶר׃ <sup>5612 </sup> <n>in the book</n>
2: וְרַבִּ֕ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>And many</n> מִיְּשֵׁנֵ֥י <sup>3463 </sup> <n>of them that sleep</n> אַדְמַת־ <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> עָפָ֖ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>in the dust</n> יָקִ֑יצוּ <sup>6974 </sup> <n>shall awake</n> אֵ֚לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לְחַיֵּ֣י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>life</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>some to everlasting</n> וְאֵ֥לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>the others</n> לַחֲרָפ֖וֹת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>and some to shame</n> לְדִרְא֥וֹן <sup>1860 </sup> <n>contempt</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[and] everlasting</n> ס
3: וְהַ֨מַּשְׂכִּלִ֔ים <sup>7919 </sup> <n>And they that be wise</n> יַזְהִ֖רוּ <sup>2094 </sup> <n>shall shine</n> כְּזֹ֣הַר <sup>2096 </sup> <n>as the brightness</n> הָרָקִ֑יעַ <sup>7549 </sup> <n>of the firmament</n> וּמַצְדִּיקֵי֙ <sup>6663 </sup> <n>to righteousness</n> הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and they that turn many</n> כַּכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <sup>3556 </sup> <n>as the stars</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> וָעֶֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>and ever</n> פ
